original: 袁紹麾下步騎逾十萬，遠勝曹操，遂有意南向爭奪天下。建安五年（200年），袁紹親率大軍聚於官渡，與曹操決勝負於一役
text: Yuan Shao rides under more than one hundred thousand steps, far surpassing Cao Cao, so he intends to fight for the world southward. In the fifth year of Jian'an (200 years), Yuan Shao led a large army to gather in Guandu, and was defeated by Cao Cao.
